amendment.description: Amendment transfers $7 million from the NASA Space Operations account to the Space Technology Mission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $7,000,000 from the Space Technology account to the Space Operations account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
